00047 void testWithSentence(Analyzer& analyzer, const string& str, ofstream& output)
00048 {
00049     // ignore the empty line
00050     if(str.empty())
00051     {
00052         return;
00053     }
00054 
00055     Sentence s(str.c_str());
00056 
00057     int result = analyzer.runWithSentence(s);
00058     if(result != 1)
00059     {
00060         cerr << "fail in Analyzer::runWithSentence()" << endl;
00061         exit(1);
00062     }
00063 
00064     // get n-best results
00065     int count = s.getListSize();
00066     if(count > 0)
00067     {
00068         output << s.getListSize() << endl;
00069         for(int i=0; i<s.getListSize(); ++i)
00070         {
00071             for(int j=0; j<s.getCount(i); ++j)
00072             {
00073                 if(j == 0)
00074                 {
00075                     output << s.getScore(i) << analyzer.getWordDelimiter();
00076                 }
00077 
00078                 const char* pLexicon = s.getLexicon(i, j);
00079                 // print word with POS alphabet string
00080                 output << pLexicon << analyzer.getPOSDelimiter() << s.getStrPOS(i, j) << analyzer.getWordDelimiter();
00081             }
00082             output << endl;
00083         }
00084     }
00085     else
00086     {
00087         cerr << "no n-best result exists for input string: " << str << endl;
00088     }
00089 }

00094 void testWithStream(Analyzer& analyzer, const char* source, const char* dest)
00095 {
00096         assert(source);
00097         assert(dest);
00098 
00099         ifstream in(source);
00100         if(! in)
00101         {
00102                 cerr << "[Error] The input file " << source << " not exists!" << endl;
00103                 exit(1);
00104         }
00105 
00106     ofstream out(dest);
00107         if(! out)
00108         {
00109                 cerr << "[Error] The output file " << dest << " could not be created!" << endl;
00110                 exit(1);
00111         }
00112 
00113     string line;
00114     while(getline(in, line))
00115     {
00116         testWithSentence(analyzer, line, out);
00117     }
00118 }

00123 void printUsage()
00124 {
00125     cerr << "Usages: ./jma_pos_nbest --dict DICT_PATH --nbest N INPUT OUTPUT" << endl;
00126 }

00131 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00132 {
00133     if(argc < 7)
00134     {
00135         printUsage();
00136         exit(1);
00137     }
00138 
00139     // check argument
00140     if(strcmp(argv[1], "--dict") || strcmp(argv[3], "--nbest"))
00141     {
00142         printUsage();
00143         exit(1);
00144     }
00145 
00146     const char* sysdict = argv[2];
00147     int nbest = atoi(argv[4]);
00148     if(nbest < 1)
00149     {
00150         cerr << "invalid number for n-best value" << endl;
00151         printUsage();
00152         exit(1);
00153     }
00154 
00155     // time evaluation for command option "--stream INPUT OUTPUT"
00156     clock_t stime = clock();
00157 
00158     // create instances
00159     JMA_Factory* factory = JMA_Factory::instance();
00160     Analyzer* analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer();
00161     Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00162 
00163     // set the number of N-best results,
00164     // if this function is not called, one-best analysis is performed defaultly on Analyzer::runWithSentence().
00165     analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST, nbest);
00166 
00167     // output POS in alphabet format
00168     analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET, 1);
00169 
00170     // load dictioanry files
00171     knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict);
00172     int result = knowledge->loadDict();
00173     if(result == 0)
00174     {
00175         cerr << "fail to load dictionary files" << endl;
00176         exit(1);
00177     }
00178 
00179     // set encoding type from the dictionary path
00180     string sysdictStr(sysdict);
00181     size_t first = sysdictStr.find_last_of('_');
00182     size_t last = sysdictStr.find_last_not_of('/');
00183     string encodeStr = sysdictStr.substr(first+1, last-first);
00184     Knowledge::EncodeType encode = Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(encodeStr.c_str());
00185     if(encode != Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM)
00186     {
00187         cout << "set encoding type: " << encodeStr << endl;
00188         knowledge->setEncodeType(encode);
00189     }
00190 
00191     // set knowledge
00192     analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge);
00193 
00194     // no POS output
00195     //analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING, 0);
00196 
00197     clock_t etime = clock();
00198     double dif = (double)(etime - stime) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00199     cout << "knowledge loading time: " << dif << endl;
00200 
00201     testWithStream(*analyzer, argv[5], argv[6]);
00202 
00203     dif = (double)(clock() - etime) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00204     cout << "stream analysis time: " << dif << endl;
00205 
00206     dif = (double)(clock() - stime) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00207     cout << "total time: " << dif << endl;
00208 
00209     // destroy instances
00210     delete knowledge;
00211     delete analyzer;
00212 
00213     return 0;
00214 }
